St._Paul.Casiville Bullard House:
The Casiville Bullard House in Saint Paul, Minnesota, United States, is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. A skilled African-American stonemason and bricklayer, Tennessee-born Casiville Bullard, built this American Foursquare home for himself in 1910.
Casiville Bullard was born in Memphis, Tennessee in 1873, the eldest of seven children.
